children.name: Divergent Thinking
children.description: Thought process or method used to generate creative ideas by exploring many possible solutions

children.name: Convergent Thinking
children.description: Problem solving technique involving the bringing together of different ideas to determine a single best solution to a lucidly defined problem.

children.name: Spatial Reasoning
children.description: The ability to understand and remember the spatial relations among objects

children.name: Numbers
children.description: The ability to use numbers effectively

children.name: Auditory
children.description: The ability to distinguish and remember tones and melodies

children.name: Memory
children.description: Short-term retention of numbers, words, patterns and objects
